title: Light Hammers
content: Light Hammers in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Light Hammers are Light Simple Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-4 Damage without enchantments. Light Hammers can additionally be Thrown, dealing the same damage they would when used for a melee attack.
